name: Target City Sniper 3D - Tactical Sniper Shooter Game
name_original: Target City Sniper 3D - Tactical Sniper Shooter Game
description:
**** The first amazing looking city sniper 3d - shooter action oriented first person shooter game of 2016 you've been expecting is here. Target City Sniper 2016 is a tactical sniper shooter game that employs stealth, hand-to-hand assassinations and titular sniping techniques. Gameplay features realistic bullet physics that factors distance, wind, and bullet drop when sniping targets. ****

Get ready for sniper 3d shooting and killing the evil enemies of the city. Perform great head shots on enemies in fantastic graphics of game play, sharpen your skill set by using modern sniper guns, and upgrade your weapon as a special elite army sniper. Prepare the modern sniper assault and get ready to clean your city from crime mafia, thugs and thieves who are ruining the city peace. Be a war agent professional sniper swat force and prove your sniper skills by completing challenging missions.

Target City Sniper 3d Shooting contains realistic 3d graphics and real battlefield sound effects . Equip yourself with most modern sniper weapons and play in multiple levels. If you don't get all the enemy soldiers with sniper before your enemy escaped, you will lose.

How to Play:

- Touch and move the screen to set the aim
- Use your Sniper scope to aim at enemies from a distance.
- Use fire button to shoot.
- Aim for the head; shoot once and accurately, to stay away from their onslaught
- The gun reloads automatically
- Zoom in to kill the enemy and then zoom out if required

Download target city sniper 3D now to enjoy the pleasure of thrilling killing, hunting and sniper shooting adventure.

Target City Sniper 3D Shooting Features

- Big variety of missions
- Realistic 3D shooting and sounds effects
- 6 modern sniper rifles - they differ in zoom distance, clip size, accuracy
- Ultra realistic 3D graphics
- Easy and intuitive controls of modern sniper guns
- supported on all apple devices including ipad pro.

We are working hard continuously to make Target City Sniper better and give you real sniper 3d experience so keep an eye on its upcoming updates.
